description: This simple blueberry balsamic dressing is bursting with sweet and savoury flavour and will elevate any salad.
keywords: Salad dressing,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Blueberry Balsamic Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until smooth. Serve with salad.
